A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It has the "uniform" of a Star Wars movie but not the heart or soul.
This film was made purely to generate money in the same way that a fast food chain does\, appeal to the senses but not the brain\, Star Wars porn but worse. 
It disregards the gravitas of the concepts created within the Star Wars galaxy (ie human natures eternal struggle with good vs evil and the respect of intellectualism vs primal fears) and character development of the last 30-40 yrs which is the real travesty of this film.
Those desperate for a quick fix will tell themselves this is a good movie. Those of us who understand the fundamentally flawed and betrayed opportunity this was will not.
Terrible.
